extDescription.message: Bypass 'Log in to continue' of Twitter, added in August 2021

addedLater.message: No content here (something may be added)

removalText.message: The wall in front of you soundlessly vanished. {donationLink} could help heal HP and keep challenging to Twitter...

donationText.message: {donationLink} will help me to keep continuing to catch up with the changes of the Twitter app.

updateText1.message: {btwl} can now erase a login wall with no blinking popup, thanks to MutationObserver. Appreciate the suggestions!

updateText2.message: If you find it useful, why don't you {donateMe} to help improve it?
